thread.title: Hacked, Data for 15 Million Customers Lost
thread.title_full: Experian Hacked, Data for 15 Million T-Mobile Customers Lost - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Hacked, Data for 15 Million Customers Lost
text: T-Mobile has announced that data for has been compromised after Experian, a third-party vendor that processes the company's credit applications, has been hacked. According to statements issued by both companies, T-Mobile customers that required a credit check in order to benefit from service or device financing between September 1, 2013 and September 16, 2015 are affected. T-Mobile says no data from other customers has been stolen, and Experia... Â»
